New Records: Rilee Rossouw became the first South African batter to score a century in a T20 World Cup
Rilee Rossouw equaled David Miller's record of two centuries in T20 internationals
Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock and Rilee Rossouw stitched a 168-run partnership off just 85 balls
South Africa scored 205 runs in their innings against Bangladesh
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rilee Rossouw's century was the 10th in T20 World Cup history
Previous centuries in T20 World Cup history were mentioned for context
